meanings.definition: A group of synthetic organic compounds used in the production of dyes.
meanings.sent1: The benzidins were essential in creating vibrant fabric dyes.
meanings.sent2: Factories often rely on benzidins to color textiles.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous chemist accidentally spilled benzidins all over the lab, creating a rainbow mess.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity bloomed like a field of flowers when she experimented with benzidins in her artwork.
meanings.sent5: The smell of benzidins lingered in the air, a reminder of the colorful possibilities they held.

meanings.definition: A type of chemical compound known for its carcinogenic properties.
meanings.sent1: Researchers are studying the effects of benzidins on human health.
meanings.sent2: Exposure to benzidins has been linked to serious health risks.
meanings.sent3: The detective suspected foul play when he found benzidins near the crime scene.
meanings.sent4: The dark shadow of benzidins loomed over the safety of the community.
meanings.sent5: The danger of benzidins was like a silent threat waiting to be uncovered.
